thread.title: Ground News - The rain in the Sierra Leone region can be as severe as the one that struck tragically in 2011, warning Cemaden — Joven Pan.

author: Jovem Pan Esportes, entretenimento, notcias e vdeos com credibilidade
title: Ground News - The rain in the Sierra Leone region can be as severe as the one that struck tragically in 2011, warning Cemaden — Joven Pan.
text: Rio de Janeiro is expected to face heavy rains this weekend, accumulating more than 200 millimeters a day, a level similar to the one that triggered the tragedy seen in the state in 2011, when about a thousand people died in landslides in the mountainous region. The forecasts were released by the National Center for Monitoring and Alerting of Natural Disasters (Cemaden), which expects large volumes of rain starting this Friday afternoon (22). The forecasts were released by the National Center for Monitoring and Alerting of Natural Disasters (Cemaden), which expects large volumes of rain starting this Friday afternoon (22).
